entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Twillingate
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain or snow changing to snow this evening. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Snowfall amount 10 cm except 2 cm along parts of the coast. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Windy. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
